about_the_game:
Hats and Guns is a roguelite deckbuilder set in the Wild West. Play as different characters with unique gameplays. Upgrade your cards and collect powerful weapons and relics as you attempt to survive in the heart of a dangerous procedurally-generated desert.

Key features

  • Deckbuilding

    Over 100 card upgrades to assign to 5 basic card types (accuracy, speed, dexterity, reflex and strength) to create powerful combos and optimize your deck.

  • 4 playable characters

    4 unique gameplay characters are available, each with a passive skill, a starting weapon and a unique starting deck.

  • Tactical combat

    Combat is grid-based, and accuracy is the central system of combat. You'll need to pay close attention to your position, resources and accuracy management to maximize damage and stay alive in these challenging encounters.

  • Procedural desert and moral choices

    Travel through the wilderness, meticulously choosing your path. Collect equipment to become more powerful and reach your goal, a fearsome gang leader!
    Will you become as cruel as he is to get your revenge, or will you stay on the right path?
